com.icodici.universa.node.network

Interface BasicHTTPService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MicroHTTPDService

    public interface BasicHTTPService
extends java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Interface for generic HTTP server implementation to be used in the Universa project.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  BasicHTTPService.BinderHandler 
      static interface  BasicHTTPService.FileUpload
      A parameter for BasicHTTPService.Request.getParams() representing fileupload arguments
      static interface  BasicHTTPService.Handler
      Handler for HTTP requests.
      static interface  BasicHTTPService.Request 
      static interface  BasicHTTPService.RequestPreprocessor 
      static interface  BasicHTTPService.Response
      HTTP response abstraction

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Shutdown the service and free all allocated resources.
      @Nullable BasicHTTPService.Handler on(java.lang.String pathStart, BasicHTTPService.Handler handler)
      Register request handler which must be called if the BasicHTTPService.Request.getPath() starts with pathStart.
      @Nullable BasicHTTPService.Handler onNotFound(BasicHTTPService.Handler handler)
      Register request handler which must be called if there is no matching on(String, Handler) requests found.
      void start(int port, int maxResponseThreads)
      Start the service in a separate thread, returns as soon as listening port will be opened.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        void start(int port,
           int maxResponseThreads)
    throws java.io.IOException
        Start the service in a separate thread, returns as soon as listening port will be opened. Should not return before the port is opened! Must use Executors.newFixedThreadPool for workers.
        Parameters:
        port - is port number
        maxResponseThreads - is maximum available threads
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if port can't be open for listening

      • close

        void close()
    throws java.lang.Exception
        Shutdown the service and free all allocated resources. Note it must not shutdown the worker pool, instead, let it finish off normally (e.g. be finalized). Must close listening socket.
        Specified by:
        close in interface java.lang.AutoCloseable
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - for closing exceptions

      • on

        @Nullable BasicHTTPService.Handler on(java.lang.String pathStart,
                                      BasicHTTPService.Handler handler)
        Register request handler which must be called if the BasicHTTPService.Request.getPath() starts with pathStart.
        Parameters:
        pathStart - the beginning of the request's path that should be handled by this handler
        handler - to handle such requests
        Returns:
        null if there were no previous handlers bound to this request path prefix before this handler; or BasicHTTPService.Handler which was bound at this prefix before and that was overwritten.

      • onNotFound

        @Nullable BasicHTTPService.Handler onNotFound(BasicHTTPService.Handler handler)
        Register request handler which must be called if there is no matching on(String, Handler) requests found.

        By default, if no onNotFound(Handler) handlers found, a response with 404 HTTP code and an empty body is returned.

        Parameters:
        handler - to handle such requests
        Returns:
        null if there were no previous handlers bound to this request path prefix before this handler; or BasicHTTPService.Handler which was bound at this prefix before and that was overwritten.
